thread.title: BRIEF-MTech Acquisition Announces Pricing Of $50 Million Initial Public Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MTech Acquisition Announces Pricing Of $50 Million Initial Public Offering
text:
January 30, 2018 / 2:33 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-MTech Acquisition Announces Pricing Of $50 Million Initial Public Offering Reuters Staff 
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Mtech Acquisition Corp: 
* MTECH ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $50 MILLION INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING 
* MTECH ACQUISITION CORP - ‍PRICED ITS INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5 MILLION UNITS AT $10.00 PER UNIT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
